__BUS-MONITOR-SYNTH__

File: overtone/sc/bus.clj Line: 266 

      (defonce __BUS-MONITOR-SYNTH__
  (defsynth mono-audio-bus-level [in-a-bus 0]
    (let [sig   (in:ar in-a-bus 1)
          level (amplitude sig)
          level (lag-ud level 0.1 0.3)]
      (tap "level" 20 level))))
